Scriptorium Core 1.0

Common interfaces and classes for Scriptorium libraries.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
io.codecastle.scriptorium
Common interfaces for building fluent, interoperable APIs for as-you-go output of structured text formats.
io.codecastle.scriptorium.function
General-purpose functional interfaces for I/O-centric operations.
io.codecastle.scriptorium.scribe
Interfaces and utility classes for outputting structured text formats.
Common interfaces and classes for Scriptorium libraries.

Scriptorium-family libraries provide fluent APIs for as-you-go output of structured text formats (e.g., JSON, XML, YAML, HTML). The goal of this Core library is to provide a solid foundation for developing format-specific libraries, and to allow interoperation between these libraries for polyglot output.
